goal.ch:
(1) 同位素地球化學於環境科學研究之基本理論

(2) 微量元素及其同位素於地球表面之分佈、循環及傳輸

(3) 環境同位素地球化學之進展與應用
goal.en:
(1) Basic principles of isotope geochemistry in environmental studies

(2) Distribution, cycling and transport of trace elements and their isotopes on Earth surface

(3) Novel applications of environmental isotope geochemistry

outline.ch: 本課程主要提供環境同位素地球化學之基本理論、應用與進展，並進一步討論於地質科學、水環境、生物作用、大氣過程與傳輸、環境鑑識、考古及古氣候古環境等領域之研究
outline.en: This course will provide up-to-date information on the range of new isotopic tools that are being developed and utilized to investigate environmental studies, including continental and aquatic processes, biological processes, atmospheric processes, environmental forensics, as well as paleoclimate and paleo-environments. Students will be asked to examine their own thoughts/opinions on the topics and given their oral/written presentations for the mid-term and final exams.

textbook.ch:
1. Handbook of Environmental Isotope Geochemistry (Mark Baskaran)

2. Non-traditional Stable Isotopes: Retrospective and Prospective (Fang-Zhen Teng, Nicolas Dauphas and James M. Watkins)

3. Stable Isotope Ecology (Brian Fry)
textbook.en:
